Package com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Awaiting
    This functional interface is used to synchronize asynchronous processes.
    Callback<T>
    This Callback is used for latching onto the ReceivingService and SendingService.
    DisconnectedHandler
    This Handler is called, once a Connection terminates.
    Expectable
    Listens for the Receiving of a specific Object.
    Feasible<T>
    This Feasible is an subtype of Callback.
    ListenAndExpect
    This is the combination of the Feasible and the Expectable
    Session
    This interface describes a Session of any Network-Object.
    SessionUpdater
    This class updates the Session and you may Send the update over the Network, to notify the Other party.
    Synchronize
    This Class is used for synchronization within NetCom2.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSynchronize
    This Class helps with creating a Synchronize instance, based on an CountDownLatch The only method, you would have to define is: Synchronize.error()
    EmptySynchronize
    This EmptySynchronize is an NullObject for Synchronize.
    Listener
    This listens for a specific ListenAndExpect, that takes an Class to check for specific actions
